body_html:
@ezyang I tried that but didn't succeed, because with the export all symbols option of CMake it's not possible to get in between cmake and vsc++ to modify the def file (at least as far as I reached).
(i.e. cmake calls msvc to export all symbols and then starts the linking process, and I didn't find a way to split this process in two so I can modify the .def file)

body:
@ezyang I tried that but didn't succeed, because with the export all symbols option of CMake it's not possible to get in between cmake and vsc++ to modify the def file (at least as far as I reached).
(i.e. cmake calls msvc to export all symbols and then starts the linking process, and I didn't find a way to split this process in two so I can modify the .def file)
